description:
Dr Buttar discusses the US Constitution, the CDC, The WHO, as well as the evolutionary process we are going through.  This is the most important of the 4 Parts - Time to WAKE UP!  How to get organized, mass gatherings, what our children will remember, and a reminder to all US Military and law enforcement, both retired and active duty are discussed.

Remember to look into the IADFW (International Association for a Disease Free World). Watch this video and pass it on! It's up to us to make sure the world KNOWS the truth!

Join me on Monday nights at 8:15 pm New York time for our livestream.  And please, be careful.  Other sites are posing as us, asking for credit card information. Be VERY CAUTIOUS and NEVER give out your credit card info to anyone. My staff will NEVER ask for any financial or credit card information, EVER!  So if anyone is asking you, they are trying to scam you.  Facebook has a number of fake profiles and despite over a hundred different people having reported this as a fake site, Facebook has not taken down this fake site.  Talk about """"fact checking""""? Our new hashtag, #WeChangeTheWorld
